### Angel, Seraph

_Beautiful, luminous humanoids with white-feathered wings._

**LV** 3, **AL** L
**AC** 14 (chainmail), **HP** 14, **MV** near (fly)
**ATK** 2 longsword +3 (1d8)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| +3 | +1 | +1 | +2 | +3 | +3 |

**Bless:** 3/day, touch one target to give it a luck token.
